properties.address: Rucstall Community Association,, Basingstoke, Hampshire RG21 3EX
properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 27th November 2023** Once Winter starts we will open the doors for a couple days a week. We try to cater for everyone - activities available, all kinds of things to do so hopefully suits all our users. Soft play areas for our younger guests - Games consoles for the older kids (age appropriate games) , shared book library plus pool table.
properties.title: Rucstall Community Centre

properties.address: St. Mark's Church, Homesteads Road, Basingstoke, Hampshire RG22 5LQ
properties.description: Our Warm Space is within the church worship area which, at other times, is used for community activities such as Mums and Toddlers, slimming club, youth club. Our Warm Welcome space is free to enter and enjoy free hot drinks / snacks. From 2pm - 4p.m. we also share the space with Tea@2, where there is an optional or 'pay as you like' basis for food and drink. Free hot drinks and snacks will remain available.
properties.title: St. Mark's Church
